channel.title: **dxpk 634**
channel.description: [center]Basically this is a very outdated server with many bugs including: Hits stop working (requires a server restart) Their is a trade glitch And I assume dupes because I didn't patch any [/center] This server isn't a leech I actually fixed a lot and made it so the server can support a good economy with bossing and pvp. THERE IS ALOT ON THIS SERVER I DIDN'T TAKE ENOUGH PICTURES [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/35i0lfo.png[/img] Ugly home :) [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2r619qw.png[/img] Tokens for rich dicers that they can use if they are over max cash. [size=14pt]Many Bosses[/size] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2w4wwh0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/i3f6e0.png[/img] All weapon specs working [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/sy2dl4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/pvree.png[/img] Working Gmaul Dropped by Rock Crabs :D [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35be9v4.png[/img] Ice Strewies Drop SOL [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vsjarc.png[/img] And of course working dicing [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/hu3y3l.png[/img] I can't stress enough how many more bosses and monsters their are but I just cba to take all the pictures. Anyways enjoy and don't flame this. ---CREDITS--- MarcBob 30% My friend Chris 5% And me 65% Btw, i'm sure people will ask if this has torva and everything well it does. Source - http://up.ht/IZ1nJY Client - http://up.ht/KugknB

item.description:

[quote=“WHATBLOOD, post:13, topic:441494”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=544192.msg3988941#msg3988941 date=1336312540]

[quote author=WHATBLOOD link=topic=544192.msg3988936#msg3988936 date=1336312254]

i checked the stability it has a nice stability of a max of 350 before it starts to lagg Witch is GOOD for this kind of version , Agreed?
[/quote]Could be better, but I’m pretty sure PIs can’t hold much more than this so…

I thought Zepsity was PI?

Ive seen it hold much more then 300.
[/quote]If that’s a bigger server they may have upgraded their networking (before the tutorial got released). But I’m pretty sure they don’t hold too much. From personal experience, Delta held more players and lagged less than PI. That could also be there was a big ass memory leak in the PI D:

Yes PI HAS EWWWWWW MEM LEAKS[/quote]

PI and Delta suck, this can hold more I’m sure.
OT: It’s a 614 not 634 -.- :fp:
